issue.title: FCD Ballot Comment GB-126
issue.discussion: It's unclear how match_results should behave if it has been default-constructed. The sub_match objects returned by operator[], prefix and suffix cannot point to the end of the sequence that was searched if no search was done. The iterators held by unmatched sub_match objects might be singular.
issue.resolution:
Add to match_results::operator[], match_results::prefix and match_results::suffix:
Requires: !empty()
